verses.verse: The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5127>flee<s%> when <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> is <S%H7291>pursuing,<s%> But the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> are <S%H982>bold<s%> as a <S%H3715>lion.<s%>

By the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> are its <S%H8269>princes,<s%> But by a <S%H120>man<s%> of <S%H995>understanding<s%> [and] <S%H3045>knowledge,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> it <S%H748>endures.<s%>
A <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> who <S%H6231>oppresses<s%> the <S%H1800>lowly<s%> Is [like] a <S%H5502>driving<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> which <S%H369>leaves<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3899>food.<s%>
Those who <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> But those who <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H1624>strive<s%> with them.

<S%H9563>Evil<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> do not <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H4941>justice,<s%> But those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3605>things.<s%>
<S%H2896>Better<s%> is the <S%H7326>poor<s%> who <S%H1980>walks<s%> in his <S%H8537>integrity,<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> he who is <S%H6141>crooked<s%> <S%H1870><s%> though he be <S%H6223>rich.<s%>
He who <S%H5341>keeps<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> is a <S%H995>discerning<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> But he who is a <S%H9565>companion<s%> of <S%H9105>gluttons<s%> <S%H3637>humiliates<s%> his father.
He who <S%H7235>increases<s%> his <S%H1952>wealth<s%> by <S%H5392>interest<s%> and <S%H8636>usury,<s%> <S%H6908>Gathers<s%> it for him who is <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to the <S%H1800>poor.<s%>
He who <S%H5493>turns<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> his <S%H241>ear<s%> from <S%H8085>listening<s%> to the <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H1571>Even<s%> his <S%H8605>prayer<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination.<s%>

He who <S%H7686>leads<s%> the <S%H3477>upright<s%> <S%H7686>astray<s%> in an <S%H9563>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> Will <S%H1931>himself<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> into his own <S%H7816>pit,<s%> But the <S%H8549>blameless<s%> will <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H9185>good.<s%>

The <S%H6223>rich<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H2450>wise<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> But the <S%H1800>poor<s%> who <S%H995>has<s%> <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H2713>sees<s%> <S%H2713>through<s%> him.
When the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H5970>triumph,<s%> there is <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8597>glory,<s%> But when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6965>rise,<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H2664>hide<s%> themselves.

He who <S%H3680>conceals<s%> his <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> will not <S%H6743>prosper,<s%> But he who <S%H3034>confesses<s%> and <S%H5800>forsakes<s%> [them] will <S%H7355>find<s%> <S%H7355>compassion.<s%>
How <S%H835>blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> who <S%H6342>fears<s%> <S%H8548>always,<s%> But he who <S%H7185>hardens<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> into <S%H9567>calamity.<s%>
[Like] a <S%H5098>roaring<s%> <S%H738>lion<s%> and a <S%H8264>rushing<s%> <S%H1677>bear<s%> Is a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H4910>ruler<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> a <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

A <S%H5057>leader<s%> who is a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4642>oppressor<s%> <S%H2638>lacks<s%> <S%H8394>understanding,<s%> [But] he who <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H1215>unjust<s%> <S%H1215>gain<s%> will <S%H748>prolong<s%> [his] <S%H3117>days.<s%>

A <S%H120>man<s%> who is <S%H6231>laden<s%> with the guilt of <S%H5315>human<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> Will be a <S%H5127>fugitive<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H953>death;<s%> let <S%H408>no<s%> one <S%H8551>support<s%> him.
He who <S%H1980>walks<s%> <S%H8549>blamelessly<s%> will be <S%H3467>delivered,<s%> But he who is <S%H6140>crooked<s%> <S%H1870><s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H259>all<s%> at <S%H259>once.<s%>

He who <S%H5647>tills<s%> his <S%H127>land<s%> will <S%H7646>have<s%> <S%H7646>plenty<s%> of <S%H3899>food,<s%> But he who <S%H7291>follows<s%> <S%H7386>empty<s%> [pursuits] will <S%H7646>have<s%> <S%H7389>poverty<s%> in <S%H7646>plenty.<s%>

A <S%H530>faithful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> will <S%H7227>abound<s%> with <S%H1293>blessings,<s%> But he who <S%H213>makes<s%> <S%H213>haste<s%> to be <S%H6238>rich<s%> will not <S%H5352>go<s%> <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%>

To <S%H5234>show<s%> <S%H5234>partiality<s%> <S%H6440><s%> is not <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H5921>Because<s%> for a <S%H6595>piece<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> a <S%H1397>man<s%> will <S%H6586>transgress.<s%>
A <S%H376>man<s%> with an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H926>hastens<s%> after <S%H1952>wealth,<s%> And does not <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H2639>want<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> upon him.
He who <S%H3198>rebukes<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> will <S%H9007>afterward<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> [more] <S%H2580>favor<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> he who <S%H9140>flatters<s%> with the <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>

He who <S%H1497>robs<s%> his father or his <S%H1>mother,<s%> And <S%H517>says,<s%> "It is not a <S%H559>transgression,<s%>" Is the <S%H6588>companion<s%> of a <S%H2270>man<s%> who <S%H376>destroys.<s%>
An <S%H7342>arrogant<s%> man <S%H1624>stirs<s%> up <S%H4066>strife,<s%> But he who <S%H982>trusts<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1878>prosper.<s%>
He who <S%H982>trusts<s%> in his own <S%H3820>heart<s%> is a <S%H3684>fool,<s%> But he who <S%H1980>walks<s%> <S%H2451>wisely<s%> will be <S%H4422>delivered.<s%>
He who <S%H5414>gives<s%> to the <S%H7326>poor<s%> will <S%H369>never<s%> <S%H4270>want,<s%> But he who <S%H5956>shuts<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> will have <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3994>curses.<s%>
When the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6965>rise,<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> themselves; But when they perish, the <S%H6>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>increase.<s%>
